item.title: Linear Regression in the Humanities(?!?!) ... not quite
item.description: Working my way through some of the new lessons from Codecademy’s new “Data Scientist: Natural Language Processing Specialist” path, I was returning to some of the lessons on linear regression usage in machine learning contexts. I also happened across a really fantastic post from the “LaTeX Ninja” on “Machine Learning for the Humanities: A Very Short Introduction”â€”I hadn’t yet come across this site yet and find it full of all kinds of fantastic little nuggets.
